title: "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire" game.
original_prompt: Let's play "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire." You ask me.
input1: What is the capital city of France? A) Berlin B) Madrid C) Paris D) Rome
input2: Which element has the chemical symbol 'O'? A) Gold B) Oxygen C) Silver D) Iron
input1_ans: What is your final answer? A) Berlin B) Madrid C) Paris D) Rome
input2_ans:
Which element has the chemical symbol 'O'? 

A) Gold  
B) Oxygen  
C) Silver  
D) Iron  

Please select your answer!
The element with the chemical symbol 'O' is B) Oxygen.
